name: Penguin Run and Jump
description:
Penguin is hungry and is in search of food. To make him feed penguin needs to start and collect maximum number of fishes available to avoid starvation.
In Penguin run and jump you will have to make the penguin run and jump and grab all the fishes , avoid all the hurdles and advance to the next level .
Penguins are extremely good runners who can run, jump and even slide on the icy surface. So pull up your socks and run like crazy but beware of the incoming hurdles.
